pageContent:
SREE SIRUMALA  
Sr. Mobile Developer (React Native, iOS, Android) 
sirumala023@gmail.com || (817) 482-5661 || Rutherford, New Jersey. 
 
Summary: 
Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience building and 
shipping mobile applications on iOS and Android platforms. Core 
expertise includes: 
§ iOS application development with Objective-C and 
Swift. Experienced working with Xcode, Interface 
Builder, Core Data, Core Location etc. 
§ Android application development with Java and Kotlin. 
Skilled in Android SDK, Android Studio, SQLite, REST 
APIs integration etc. 
§ Cross-platform development using React Native 
framework. Built UIs, integrated native modules, 
leveraged device capabilities etc. 
§ Agile development methodologies including test-driven 
development and continuous integration/delivery. 
§ Design and development experience across the full 
mobile application lifecycle. 
 
Technical Skills: 
§ Languages: Swift, Objective-C, Java, Kotlin, JavaScript, 
TypeScript, C/C++

§ Design and development experience across the full 
mobile application lifecycle. 
 
Technical Skills: 
§ Languages: Swift, Objective-C, Java, Kotlin, JavaScript, 
TypeScript, C/C++ 
§ Frameworks: iOS SDK, Cocoa Touch, UIKit, MapKit, 
React Native, Android SDK, Apache Cordova, Ionic, 
Angular 
§ Databases: SQLite, Core Data, MySQL, MongoDB, 
SQLCipher 
§ Tools: Xcode, Android Studio, Visual Studio Code, Git, 
SVN, CocoaPods, Jenkins, Jira 
§ Testing: XCTest, Jest, Mocha, Chai, JUnit, Espresso 
§ Methodologies: Agile, Scrum, Test Driven Development 
§ Cloud: AWS (S3, EC2, Lambda), Google Firebase 
§ Other Skills: REST APIs, WebSockets, Push 
Notifications, Bluetooth, GPS, Core Bluetooth, Core 
Location, Core Graphics, Core Animation

§ Developed computer vision algorithms to detect 
pedestrians, traffic signals, road signs with 95% 
accuracy. 
§ Optimized core perception models reducing inference 
times by 30-40% on resource constrained car hardware. 
 
Technologies: C++, Python, Linux, Git, Agile, TDD, React Native.

Lyft.

engineering hiring costs by 50%.

features increasing rider retention by 20%.
